    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean canUncheck​(boolean color)
    This method given a team (color), traverse's through board and checks if any same color piece can legally move to a space so that team is no longer in check.
    static boolean checkTurn​(int counter, int currentI, int currentJ)
    This method checks for the correct turn or if the user tried to move a piece from an empty location and returns true if everything is in correct order

    This method takes the user input (String) and returns the current rank in which the piece is.

    This method takes the user input (String) and returns the current file in which the piece is.

    static boolean inCheck​(boolean color)
    This method given a team (color), traverse's through board and checks if any piece can capture that team's king.
    static boolean isCellEmpty​(int currentI, int currentJ)
    This method takes current location of the piece and checks if the piece is present or not return true if the piece is present
    static boolean isWithInBoard​(int i, int j)
    This method checks if the rank or file is greater than 8 Returns true if it's under 8 and false other wise

    • movePiece

      public static boolean movePiece​(int i, int j, int ti, int tj)
      This method takes current and target location for piece and returns true if the piece was able to move false otherwise
      Parameters:
      i - current rank index of the piece
      j - current file index of the piece
      ti - target rank index for the piece
      tj - target file index for the piece
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • inCheck

      public static boolean inCheck​(boolean color)
      This method given a team (color), traverse's through board and checks if any piece can capture that team's king. if so, team is in check. Returns true if it can and false otherwise
      Parameters:
      color - Color to decide the team
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • canUncheck

      public static boolean canUncheck​(boolean color)
      This method given a team (color), traverse's through board and checks if any same color piece can legally move to a space so that team is no longer in check. Return true if it can otherwise false
      Parameters:
      color - Color to decide the team
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • isWithInBoard

      public static boolean isWithInBoard​(int i, int j)
      This method checks if the rank or file is greater than 8 Returns true if it's under 8 and false other wise
      Parameters:
      i - rank value
      j - file value
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • checkTurn

      public static boolean checkTurn​(int counter, int currentI, int currentJ)
      This method checks for the correct turn or if the user tried to move a piece from an empty location and returns true if everything is in correct order
      Parameters:
      counter - -to check whose turn it is (even for white side, odd for black side)
      currentI - -row in which the piece is
      currentJ - -column in which the piece is
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • isCellEmpty

      public static boolean isCellEmpty​(int currentI, int currentJ)
      This method takes current location of the piece and checks if the piece is present or not return true if the piece is present
      Parameters:
      currentI - Current rank of the piece
      currentJ - Current file of the piece
      Returns:
      boolean value
